
```{mermaid}
---
config:
  layout: elk
  elk:
    mergeEdges: true
    nodePlacementStrategy: LINEAR_SEGMENTS
---
flowchart LR
  index["Index"]
  number1["Number 1"]
  number2["Number 2"]
  index --> number1
  index --> number2
  click index "index.html"
  click number1 "number1.html"
  click number2 "number2.html"

```
Note: the first line of the included file needs to be an empty line. If the first line of the included file is the one that starts with three backticks (```) an error may happen.
